name: trello_create_card
description: Create a new card in a Trello list. Requires the list ID and card name.

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: Trello list ID to create the card in

parameters.name: due_date
parameters.description: Due date in ISO format (e.g. '2025-12-31'). Leave empty for no due date.

steps.code: const params = new URLSearchParams({ idList: `{{list_id}}`, name: `{{name}}` }); const desc = `{{description}}`; if (desc) params.set('desc', desc); const due = `{{due_date}}`; if (due) params.set('due', due); const resp = await fetch('/1/cards?' + params.toString(), { method: 'POST', credentials: 'same-origin' }); if (!resp.ok) { const err = await resp.text(); throw new Error('Create card failed: ' + resp.status + ' ' + err); } const card = await resp.json(); return { success: true, id: card.id, name: card.name, url: card.shortUrl || card.url }
steps.name: result
steps.label: Create card via Trello API
